full_summary:
**Applied Suicide Intervention Skills Training (ASIST)**
==============================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **[Title]** Applied Suicide Intervention Skills Training (ASIST)
* **[Government Reference]** CB-139-42800214
* **[Amendment Number]** 5
* **[Solicitation Number]** 3000767786/A
* **[Publication Date]** November 27, 2023
* **[Tender Closing Date]** December 6, 2023
* **[Amendment Date]** December 6, 2023

**Contract Requirements**
----------------------

The Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC) is seeking a contractor to provide two certified ASIST instructors to deliver a two-day, in-person suicide prevention training course on an "as and when requested" basis. Training locations may vary.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 28, 2024

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Not Applicable

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

The contracting entity is Veterans Affairs Canada. For more information, please contact the following representative:

* **Name:** Joanne Jay
* **Email:** [joanne.jay@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.jay@veterans.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (782) 377-0006
* **Address:** PO BOX 7700, CHARLOTTETOWN, Prince Edward Island C1A 8M9, Canada

**Attachments**
---------------

You can obtain further information and download the tender documents at the following links:

* [Apply Suicide Intervention Skills (ASIST) Training](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25972/3000767786-a-applied-suicide-intervention-skills-ASIST.PDF)
* [RFQ for Applied Suicide Intervention Skills (ASIST) Training – Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25972/3000767786-a_amd-001_-_rfp_applied_suicide_intervention_skills_ASIST.PDF)

Please note that this tender announcement has expired on December 6, 2023. All interested parties have missed the tender closing
